title: Flower power pizza
description: The power in this gluten-free pizza comes from the protein-rich almonds, egg white and buckwheat, while the ‘flower’ comes from the cauliflower used to make the pizza base. Try adding herbs and toppings of your choice.This pizza provides 985 kcal, 46g protein, 43g carbohydrate (of which 8.5g sugars), 70g fat (of which 24g saturates), 6g fibre and 4.8g salt.
ingredients: butter, ghee or coconut oil, for greasing
140g/5oz cauliflower (about ¼ of a head without the stalk)
2 handfuls fresh tomatoes (a mixture of colours look good)
drizzle of olive oil, to serve
